scripts.build-portable: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.production.js --output-public-path=dist/ --output-path=build-portable/dist/ && copyfiles index.html build-portable && node scripts/zip-folder.js build-portable wsd-2016-slides-portable.zip
scripts.publish: npm run clean && npm run clean-portable && npm run build && npm run build-portable && copyfiles index.html build && copyfiles wsd-2016-slides-portable.zip build && cd build && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m "update slides" && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am "update slides" && git push git@github.com:reelm/wsd-2016-slides.git gh-pages --force
scripts.konfur:publish: npm run clean && npm run clean-portable && npm run build && npm run build-portable && copyfiles index.html build && copyfiles wsd-2016-slides-portable.zip build && cd build && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m "update slides" && git checkout -b gh-pages && git add . && git commit -am "update slides" && git push git@github.com:reelm/konfur-2016-slides.git gh-pages --force
